page.title: 12Clubs - Local
page.content:
The Weobley Agricultural Improvement Society has members living in the area This Society runs an event called "The Ploughing Match" each autumn at which there are competitions for ploughing, flower arranging, crafts, and cookery.
There is a trotting match held annually on one of the farms and several farmers are on the Committee.
One farmers wife belongs to the Vale of Arrow choir and the Hereford Floral Club and is on the committee for the organisation of the Kington Eisteddfod
Other activities include the Radnor and West Hereford hunt, cricket, football, hockey, rounders and netball
There is a shooting syndicate in the area.
